price: Ní ọjọ́ tí wọ́n á fọn fèrè oníwo fún àjíǹde. A sí máa kó àwọn ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ jọ ní ọjọ́ yẹn, tí ojú wọn yó sì dúdú batakun.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
